      • cutVector

        public int[] cutVector(int[][] matrix,
                       int position,
                       boolean isHorizontal)
        Cuts a single vector out of a Matrix Object.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix Object to cut Vector out of
        position - The index of the vector
        isHorizontal - True if the vector is a N (horizontal Vector), false for M (vertical)
        Returns:
        Array with the Vector values

      • countValue

        public int countValue(int value,
                      boolean alongDiagonal)
        Count how often a specific value appears in the matrix.
        Parameters:
        value - value to search for
        alongDiagonal - true to ignore mirrored values along the diagonal (only count once per row)
        Returns:
        the sum of value appearing in the matrix
